name: Block City Fire Truck Rescue
description:
Drive a blocky fire truck responding to SOS calls in the city as the blocky city guardian. You are the guardian of the blocky city and you have to run these impossible rescue missions and help the people in need of rescue. You will have to be very vigilant as blocky fire victims need medical help instantly. The SOS calls need to be monitored and responded so that the rescue missions on blocky fire trucks and ambulance rescue can be carried out.

This is a fun SOS game where you get to experience being a fireman and blocky rescue medical officer working to help people in need. Driving a fire truck or rescue ambulance in emergency to reach the city people who need help. The situation can be near to impossible and you as the city guardian will need to provide help to all the citizens who have called for SOS.

Grab the keys of your fire truck or ambulance and take people out of the impossible situation. Be the trustworthy blocky city guardian and make the impossible, possible in the blocky world.
